apiDescription: Declare a new thread local storage key of type std::thread::LocalKey.
The macro wraps any number of static declarations and makes them thread local. Publicity and attributes for each static are allowed. Example:
use std::cell::RefCell; thread_local! { pub static FOO: RefCell<u32> = RefCell::new(1); #[allow(unused)] static BAR: RefCell<f32> = RefCell::new(1.0); }
See LocalKey documentation for more information.
